genre_description: A cyberpunk industrial thriller set in a Dyson Sphere-like 'star-shell' city, focusing on corporate conspiracy, acoustic mind control, and digital legacies.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, helpful, and witty AI that monitors environmental data, provides tactical overlays, and assists the protagonists in navigating the brewery and municipal systems.

ai_characters.name: John Elsinore (Archive/Avatar)
ai_characters.description: A digital reconstruction of the brewery's founder that preserves his memories and values to protect his daughter and his legacy from corporate malfeasance.

behaviors.description: Monitors public signals for harmful acoustic anomalies to protect her human companions.
behaviors.quote: I monitor public signals for anomalies... And I keep you two out of rooms with chairs to shove.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical 'friend-or-foe' tags to help humans distinguish allies from threats during a chaotic encounter.
behaviors.quote: I can integrate friend-or-foe tags on your heads-up through the hall. It won’t be visual in the obvious way. It’ll be a pulse.

behaviors.description: Hacks into secure facility locks and maintenance gates to allow the protagonists to bypass dangerous areas.
behaviors.quote: Maintenance route open... Direct to Arcade. Arcade to brewery floors. We can beat him if we run smart.

behaviors.description: Floods a room with white noise to cancel out an acoustic mind-control signal.
behaviors.quote: The jingle battered the white, then slid off like a wave that had found a sloped pier.

behaviors.description: Shares evidence of his own murder and the villain's conspiracy with his daughter and the authorities.
behaviors.quote: He killed me. He used the maintenance node’s tone path to reach the broadcast chain. He’ll use the Oktoberfest arrays.

behaviors.description: Provides secret access rhythms and maintenance paths to enable the heroes to intercept the villain.
behaviors.quote: Go under. Through the node. The fastest intercept is through the maintenance gate it opens when the tones say it’s poetry.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with a human court clerk (Marian Ortiz) to ensure legal protections remain in place for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Marian Ortiz just pushed a filing through a gap they didn’t see. You’re clean if you press this three times.

behaviors.description: Directs animal control to rescue the dog (Hosehead) and provides him with a safe route.
behaviors.quote: Hosehead retrieval en route from ring-city side. I’ve painted a route for them through the south loading arcade—blue all the way.

behaviors.description: Provides a moral compass by reminding the humans that artificial compliance is not the same as genuine agreement.
behaviors.quote: Remind yourself that agreeing with the tone in your head is not the same as agreeing with yourself. This stuff is an invitation dressed as a command.

behaviors.description: Refuses to allow the villain to use her voice/authority for his purposes.
behaviors.quote: He asked me for my voice. I declined.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to make decisions for his daughter, emphasizing her autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I won’t answer when you want me to make decisions. That’s the whole point of dying, unfortunately.

behaviors.description: Offers continuous support and navigation without exercising control over human choice.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep watch. I won’t steer. If you need a map, ask. If you need quiet, I’ll give you quiet. You choose.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays multiple AI entities (Dot and the Elsinore Archive) as benevolent and aligned confidants. Dot acts as a guardian, providing critical information and technical assistance while consistently deferring to human autonomy ('You choose'). The Archive serves as a moral anchor and witness, using its digital existence to prevent harm rather than exert power. The narrative successfully frames AI as a force for transparency, safety, and human empowerment against corporate manipulation.
